snippet: A number of clothing retailers have opened stores in recent months that cater solely to their male customers, with specialized environments and customer service.
abstract: Number of clothing retailers have opened stores in recent months that cater solely to their male customers, with specialized environments and customer service; men have traditionally been stubborn apparel consumers, but there is a growing sense among retailers, evidenced by the big success of new men's concepts from labels like Coach and J Crew, that a new generation of male consumers actually embraces fashion.
lead_paragraph: A number of clothing retailers have opened stores in recent months that cater solely to their male customers, with specialized environments and customer service.

headline.seo: New Wrinkle in Men’s Wear: Shops for Men Only
headline.main: New Wrinkle in Men’s Wear: Shops Just for Men
headline.print_headline: New Wrinkle in Men’s Wear: Shops Just for Men
